title: My website v5
content: The most recent version of my website in which I present my interest for IT and the different projects I have made throughout the years.

title: Q-learning
content: Making of a game and an IA using the C language and SDL2 to find the exit of a maze via the quickest path.

title: Anniminder (Discord Bot)
content: Discord Bot which reminds people birthdays with a random sentence in the servers he set his birthday or can tell the birthday of someone else if asked by another user.

title: Langslater (Discord Bot)
content: Discord Bot which translates messages which are not in the language selected by the servers' administrators.
